name: AMS Media Group
tagline: Beyond brand ambition your journey starts here
description: AMS is a 100% independent media agency, established for over 40 years, with an unparalleled track record in building enduring client relationships based upon trust, total commitment, and an unerring focus on "the goal". Our clients stay with us for an average of 8 years - that's 4 times the industry norm - which is testament to our delivery of success year after year, and our dogged determination to conquer the next challenge, whatever that might be.
